extendedInfo.description: Cardiac risk calculator is a very simple application which allows a cardiovascular risk calculation based on some user input parameters and the Framingham equation.It calculates the following outcomes:- Coronary heart disease (CHD)- Myocardial infarction- Stroke- Cardiovascular disease (CVD)- Death from coronary heart disease- Death from cardiovascular diseaseThis application has been provided with the hope that it will be useful, but without warranty, implied or explicit, of fitness for a particular purpose. The author will not accept responsibility for anything. No applications can be good as your medic.

reviews.title: cardiac risk calculator reverses male/female risks
reviews.comment: Great little app except that the developer didn\'t notice that the gender buttons are reversed. Eg: a 50 yr old non smoking, non diabetic MALE with a Bp of 120, a chol of 200 and an HDL of 50 with no LVH is given a 10 year total cardiovascular risk of 4.7%. The same stats for a FEMALE give a risk of 7.4%. It\'s obviously REVERSED!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: As a doctor I am using this to satisfy my patients
reviews.author: A Google User
